Title: Steam Tank Commander
Legend: At the forefront of larger Steam Tank formations ride the Steam Tank Commanders, veterans of countless battles who are deft at coordinating shock assaults that leave the enemy shattered and reeling.
Intro: A Steam Tank Commander is armed with an Ironweld Long Rifle, Repeater Handgun, and Sword or Rod.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unitâ€™s Steam Tank is armed with a Steam Cannon, Steam Gun and Crushing Wheels.

Rules.Name: Division Commander
Rules.Fluff: From atop the turret, the Commander directs the other tanks in their division upon the battlefield.
Rules.Rule: This unit can issue the same command up to 2 times in the same phase. If it does so, each command must be received by a friendly STEAM TANK. No command point is spent the second time this unit issues that command in that phase.

Rules.Name: Steel Behemoth
Rules.Fluff: Enemy warriors are crushed beneath the ironclad bulk of this war machine.
Rules.Rule: After this unit makes a charge move, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of this unit and roll a dice. On a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
